Avatar Life My Town

April 13, 2025 Tags: Cook, Family, Fun, Simulator
Avatar Life: My Town game is a casual simulator game for kids. You can enjoy creating your sweet home stories! Meet fun family characters in the dollhouse game! Role-play house games and manage family life in your new home! You need to take good care of your character and prepare delicious food. Cooking a big meal.
